dump.description: Dump the response in kore tests

empty.body:
Scenario: [Err]  ${1:desc}
When I call the  "${2:handler}"."${3:method}" handler with no data
Then the response should not be successful
And the response error code should be 400
And the error data JSON node "violations.fields.${4:field}" should exist

eq.body: And the JSON node "${1:node}" should be equal to "${2:value}"

val.body: And the error data JSON node "violations.fields.${1:field}" should exist
